ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only robes
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree.. the only thing I don t like about the caster classes is the low level of visual equipment we get.. not that big a deal, but would be nice ;) ...
ygData.messageBody:
I agree.. the only thing I don't like about the caster classes is the low
level of visual equipment we get.. not that big a deal, but would be nice ;)
----- Original Message -----
From: Sloop
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, July 04, 1999 12:54 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] enchanter only robes


Although I could by this point easily have an FBR or something of the sort,
I stick with my Gold Senior Apprentice robe, just because it's enchanter
only. Think of it as 'Enchanter Pride'. I think that there should be some
decent enchanter only robes, which of course would be quest items, and no
trade/ no drop, and lore. This goes for the other spellcasting classes as
well.
-Sloop
